trap.name: Spike Trap
trap.desc: There appears to be a loose stone in the floor. You see what looks like spikes lining the bottom of a shallow pit.
trap.activation: Your foot slips along a loose stone in the floor and your leg plunged into the darkness. You have fallen on a spike trap.
trap.detection: You found a trap. It looks like it might be a spike trap.
trap.disable: Luckily you were able to disable the trap.
